text: Hi everyone! do you have any idea how can I fetch some dynamic values and populate it on the email template? for context, I'm currently working on a custom module which is a calculator (custom module) and it will have a button that when if the user clicked it, there will be a form that will pop up and after the user finished adding the right data on the form it will send an email to the user with dynamic values depending on the value they input on the calculator.

You can use HubL to output the value of properties, but if what you want to display is different based on those values, then I think you’ll need to have programmable email beta enabled to use if/else statements.
